com.sony.smarttennissensor.service

Interface ILiveModeListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ILiveModeListener.Stub

    public interface ILiveModeListener
    Callback to clients when the sensor is in LiveMode.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ILiveModeListener.Stub
      Local-side IPC implementation stub class.

      • onError

        void onError(int error)
             throws android.os.RemoteException
        Parameters:
        error -
        4097 = Connection lost with sensor, either because the sensor is manually turned off or battery has fully discharged.
        4098 = Invalid State. For example, when IHost.startLiveMode(com.sony.smarttennissensor.service.ILiveModeListener) is invoked when disconnected.
        8193 = IHost.setConfig(Config, IResultListener, IOnConfigChangeListener) has not been called.
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException
